function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for spread of contagious diseases in congested greenspaces","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and disease transmission among people using greenspaces","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing guidelines and regulations in greenspaces to reduce close contact between individuals","Technologies":"Public health awareness campaigns and communication technologies for disseminating guidelines and regulations","People":"People using or visiting greenspaces","Owner":"Local authorities and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate management of waste and sanitation in greenspaces","Impact":"Risk of contamination and disease spread due to improper waste management and sanitation in greenspaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of waste management and sanitation facilities in greenspaces, as well as regular maintenance and cleaning","Technologies":"Waste management systems, sanitation facilities, and monitoring technologies for cleanliness and hygiene","People":"People using or visiting greenspaces","Owner":"Local authorities and environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and education on disease prevention in greenspaces","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to contagious diseases due to lack of knowledge and awareness about disease prevention in greenspaces","Mitigation":"Education campaigns on disease prevention, hygiene practices, and health guidelines for greenspace users","Technologies":"Digital platforms for disseminating educational materials, interactive apps for health guidance, and community engagement tools","People":"People using or visiting greenspaces","Owner":"Public health organizations and community health advocates"}]}
